backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with OAuth config, user accounts, room/game/player data models, and in‑memory maps for persistent storage.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files including pages, components, utilities, and styles.
frontend/deploy/Caddyfile: Caddy reverse‑proxy config routing /api/* to backend canister and all other paths to frontend canister with caching and security headers.
frontend/deploy/nginx.conf: Nginx reverse‑proxy config routing /api/* to backend canister, serving frontend canister for other routes, and setting caching, SSL, and security headers.
frontend/docs/configuration.md: Documentation describing frontend and backend configuration, environment variables, canister connection, and same‑origin API behavior.
frontend/docs/deployment.md: Deployment guide covering prerequisites, local development steps, production deployment, and reverse‑proxy setup.
frontend/docs/game-snapshot-contract.md: Documentation defining the canonical game snapshot structure used for realtime syncing and frontend rendering.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata and loading the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, colors, icons, and display settings.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing caching, offline support, and cache management for the PWA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all application routes and renders the router provider.
frontend/src/components/dev/BackendDebug: UI panel for testing backend health and displaying the detected backend URL.
frontend/src/components/game/GameOverScr: Displays a game-over summary with winner info and action buttons.
frontend/src/components/game/Keypad.tsx: Numeric keypad component with quick scores, voice button, and submit/clear actions.
Displays a player's name, remaining score, and active status highlighting.
frontend/src/components/game/ResumeSaved: Modal prompting the user to resume or discard a previously saved game.
frontend/src/components/game/ThreeDartsE: UI component for selecting up to three darts with multipliers, numbers, and bull options, then submitting them.
frontend/src/components/game/TurnHistory: Shows the last five turns with player names, scores, remaining points, and status icons.
frontend/src/components/game/VoiceScoreC: Modal prompting users to confirm or edit a voice‑recognized score before submitting.
frontend/src/components/rooms/ClaimSeatP: Panel allowing authenticated users to claim unclaimed player seats with success and error handling.
frontend/src/components/rooms/DisplaySco: Displays current player scores or a game‑over winner view with turns taken.
frontend/src/components/rooms/GameSettin: Form for configuring new games, including mode, double‑out option, and player assignments.
frontend/src/components/rooms/HostLiveSc: UI for hosts to input scores and undo turns, updating the game snapshot via API calls.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RecentTurn: Displays the last 10 turns in a read‑only table showing player, score, remaining, and status.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomCodeDi: Shows the room code with a copy-to-clipboard button and confirmation alert.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameDetails.ts: Fetches metadata for a specific game using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameHistory.ts: Provides hooks for fetching a user’s game history and paginated game turns.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameRealtime.ts: Manages realtime WebSocket subscription for game snapshots with auto-connect and reconnect logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyProfile.ts: Fetches the current user’s profile and exposes loading state dependent on actor readiness.
Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerGameStats.ts: Hooks to fetch player game statistics by game or by user.
frontend/src/hooks/useSession.ts: Wraps Internet Identity to expose high-level auth state, sign-in/out, and session utilities.
React hook wrapping browser SpeechRecognition, managing listening state, transcript, and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserStats.ts: React-query hooks that fetch current or specific user statistics through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme tokens and global styles.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Main app layout with header, session-aware profile menu, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/lib/adminTokenStorage.ts: Utilities to store, fetch, and remove admin tokens in localStorage by normalized room code.
frontend/src/lib/authHeaders.ts: Builds request auth headers, adding X-ADMIN-TOKEN for mutations using stored admin tokens.
frontend/src/lib/checkoutSuggestions.ts: Returns curated checkout routes for darts based on remaining score and Double Out rules.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Defines backend base URL and helpers for resolving and joining API endpoints.
frontend/src/lib/gameCore.ts: Game logic module handling scoring, turn application, busts, and win conditions for darts.
frontend/src/lib/gamePersistence.ts: Provides localStorage save/load utilities for game state with turn migration and basic validation.
frontend/src/lib/gameSettings.ts: Defines game settings and handles saving, loading, validating, and sanitizing player settings via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/gameStats.ts: Computes per‑player statistics such as averages, 180s, busts, and checkout percentage from game turns.
frontend/src/lib/httpClient.ts: Wraps fetch calls to the backend with CORS‑safe settings and consistent JSON response handling.
frontend/src/lib/playerDisplayName.ts: Supplies helpers to choose a player's display name and detect unclaimed seats.
frontend/src/lib/realtimeEventEnvelope.t: Defines realtime event envelope types, snapshot schema, and utilities to parse and validate incoming events.
frontend/src/lib/realtimeTransport.ts: Implements a WebSocket‑based realtime transport with fallback, reconnection, and event dispatching.
frontend/src/lib/roomGameApi.ts: Provides API helpers for creating room games, claiming seats, and fetching snapshots via backend actors.
frontend/src/lib/roomsApi.ts: Provides functions to create rooms and fetch rooms by code using a backend actor, including random code generation and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/voiceScoreParser.ts: Converts spoken English number phrases into numeric dart scores, supporting hundreds, tens, and compound forms.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity provider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/GameDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed game info and paginated turn history fetched from the backend, handling invalid IDs and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/GameHistoryPage.tsx: Shows authenticated users a paginated, filterable list of their past games with date and mode filters.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Manages active gameplay including input, voice recognition, turn logic, realtime updates, and game state persistence.
frontend/src/pages/GoogleOAuthRedirectPa: Placeholder page for handling Google OAuth redirect.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides sign‑in flow using Internet Identity with redirect logic and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/MyAccountPage.tsx: Legacy account route that automatically redirects users to the new profile page.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays user profile with authentication states, showing sign-in, registration prompts, or profile details with stats.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Handles profile creation with validation, authentication checks, and mutation to register a new user.
frontend/src/pages/RoomDisplayTvPage.tsx: Shows a read-only TV/scoreboard view for a room, connecting to realtime game updates and handling connection states.
frontend/src/pages/RoomHostScorerPage.ts: Allows hosts to create and manage games for a room, handling admin tokens, settings, and live scoring updates.
frontend/src/pages/StartGamePage.tsx: Provides UI to start a local game or create/join multiplayer rooms, managing player setup, modes, and backend room creation.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Renders a statistics page showing saved game data, navigating back based on game state and displaying computed per‑player stats in a table.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend build.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React plugins, environment variable injection, path aliases, dev server proxy, and build output setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, architecture notes, and known issues for the Dart Scoring app.
